name: Pixel Pandemic - LDJam 46
description:
A virus has infected your pet dog Rufas. Only the Government has the cure. Are you willing to fight your way through run down New York, flooded with FBI agents, and journey through the sewers fighting mutant rats, to find the cure? 

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 46 game jam in 72 hours. Check out our entry here

This was our first time making a game, not only for a game jam but also just for fun. 

Hope everyone has fun (Even if its a bit glitchy) 

Made by LKAccidental and LKSneaky.
